Test Name: Drug-Induced Liver Injury LFT Panel (DILL) and Immunoglobulin E (IgE) assays
Purpose: To provide standardized analytical procedures to ensure accurate, reliable, and reproducible results for DILL and IgE testing.
Container: Standard serum collection tube (e.g., serum separator tube)
Equipment: Centrifuge; Automated analyzer or immunoassay analyzer; Pipettes and tips; Refrigerators; Freezers; Water baths; Heating blocks; Incubators
